main.*:
: ''See [[Gavin Mitchell]] for Rachel's colleague.''

'''Gavin''' is the name of a janitor in the hospital where [[Carol Willick|Carol]] is giving birth, played by [[Jackie Bright]]. He appears in ''[[The One With The Birth]]'' when he lets [[Susan Bunch|Susan]] and [[Ross Geller|Ross]] out of the store cupboard they found themselves locked in.

Although his name is not mentioned, it is visible on his name tag "GAVIN". The character is listed in the credits as "The Janitor".
